practice_phrases.target: I like to practise with you
I like learning English very much

practice_phrases.known: 我喜欢帮别人学习英语
practice_phrases.target: I like to help people learn English

practice_phrases.known: 我知道你喜欢学习，因为你每天都练习
practice_phrases.target: I know you like learning, because you practise all day

practice_phrases.known: 我很喜欢感觉好像我能轻松说英语
practice_phrases.target: I like feeling as if I can speak English easily
